alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 22 at 9:30PM EDT until October 23 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northeast and northwest Ohio and northwest Pennsylvania. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
